entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
